data.text: @TODAYshow @hodakotb This Southern gal has finished her Christmas shopping.... just saying😌
@TODAYshow @hodakotb Seems I always get a regift from my 30yo nephew..suits me it’s usually extravagant fruit/nut baskets he’s received at work
@TODAYshow @hodakotb @hodakotb  Somewhat off topic, but I love the earrings you’re wearing today (Nov. 2 Friday). Would you please share who makes them, and where to order? TY!
@TODAYshow @hodakotb LOVE CHRISTMAS apples are usually KINDER this time of year ❤️❤️❤️🎄🎄🎄🎄
@TODAYshow @hodakotb My strategy is to support small business during the holiday season!
